spell.name: Infect
entries: You inflict a creature you can see within range with a magical disease. At the start of each of the target's turns, it must make a Constitution saving throw. The creature takes {@damage 1d12} necrotic damage on a failed saving throw, or half as much on a successful one. If the target succeeds on three of these saves, the spell ends.
A {@i lesser restoration} spell cast on the target ends this spell early.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d12} for every two slot levels above 1st.
